ComicInfo.Summary:
Fan-favorite CANTO continues! Canto and his friend Aulaura continue their search for allies against the Shrouded Man. And while their newest lead is promising, little do they know that the Shrouded Man’s Fury has uncovered the same information! It’s a race to the hidden home of Canto’s former slavers! Join the latest adventure in the Canto-verse that Major Spoilers called “a quest story to savor.”
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Drew Zucker (a) & Vittorio Astone (c) | 1-2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Igor Wolski | 3 |
